text: Chen Li-an (; born 22 June 1937), sometimes spelled Chen Lu-an, is a Taiwanese electrical engineer, mathematician and retired politician. He was born in Qingtian, Zhejiang, Republic of China. From 1993 to 1995, he was the President of Control Yuan. Chen was Minister of Economic Affairs of the Republic of China from 1988 to 1990. He was Minister of National Defense of the Republic of China from 1991 to 1993. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Taiwanese politicians Category:Mathematicians Category:Massachusetts Institute of Technology alumni Category:New York University alumni Category:Electrical engineers Category:Scientists from Zhejiang Category:Politicians from Zhejiang
title: Chen Li-an
